document_data.name: Clarity
document_data.Effects: This spell removed most effects hampering the target's mind. For each such effect removed the target was subjected to a minor amount of [[negative energy]]. It then provided full protection against all mind-affecting spells for the duration of the spell, ranging from little under a minute to a few minutes depending on the caster's power.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a  [[Somatic component|somatic]] component to cast.
